articles.author: Rafael Bernal
articles.title: Trump tariffs threaten to crack open North American economies - The Hill
articles.description: MEXICO CITY — President-elect Trump’s pledge to impose tariffs on Mexico and Canada threatens to upend decades of North American integration, a bumpy process that’s recast the two U.S. neighbors as providers of raw and finished goods for the world’s biggest e…
